interestingcomments.content: Leica M4 dark spot on rangefinder patch /!/ I just had my Leica M4 CLA'd by Youxin, after about a day of usage a dark spot appears on the rangefinder patch. I cleaned the rangefinder window and the viewfinder, but the spot is still there. I don't really want to send it back in for CLA again, and I'm wondering if there are any ways I can fix this at home.
